title: (Insert Champion Name Here) the (Insert Champion Title Here)
body:
(Insert Champion Name Here) will be my first champion concept. The theme/premise behind this character is that they are a weird magician/dueller. This character is a congregation of many different types of magic and combat styles. If this character is too random then I will rework his/her theme to something else. If you dislike the idea overall please elaborate.
____
**Base statistics:**
Health: 495 - 1750
Mana: 210 - 988
Mana Regen: 12 - 30
AD: 65 - 102
Auto Attack Range: 615
Armor: 30 - 70
Magic Resist: 38 - 65
Movement Speed: 310
Attack Speed: 0.65 


**Passive:** *Eccentricity*
Mana does not regenerate over time.
Basic Attacks restore 8 Mana per auto attack.
Silences cause autoattacks to miss.

**Q:** *Cryoember*
CD: 10/9/8/7/6 seconds
Cast Time: 0.1
Cost: 60/50/45/40/35/30 Mana
Range: 900 (As quick as Ryze Q)
• Casts a linear projectile that is a fiery ice lance that slows for 50% in a 300 radial area for 1 second. Detonates on first enemy contact. This projectile also deals 30/50/75/90/110 + (50% of AP) magic damage over 3 seconds and 20/30/40/50/60 + (40% AD) physical damage instantaneously.

**W:** *Transference*
CD: 14/13/12/11/10 seconds
Cast Time: 0 seconds
Cost: 50 Mana
Range: 610
• Steals 20 Armor, 20 Magic Resist and 10/20/30/40/50 + (5% of target's current mana/energy/fury or rage) as mana, of the nearest enemy target for 10 seconds.

**E:** Nullification
CD: 20/18/16/14/12 seconds 
Cast Time: 0.5 seconds
Cost: 45/40/35/25/20 Mana
Range: 1200 (As quick as Soraka's AA)
• Fires a small bright projectile; lock on ability that renders all of one target's passives completely useless for 5 seconds (persists after death).
• Slows for 40% for 2.5 seconds.

**R:** *Ascent*
CD: 80 
Cast Time: 0.15 seconds
Cost: Zero
Range: Self
• Gains 4% of max mana per second for 3 seconds and auto attacks deal 40/60/80 + (55% AP and 30% AD) magic damage for 5 seconds. 
• Gains True Sight for 2 seconds. Sight Wards do not share this True Sight. i.e. invisible enemy champions in a brush that your team has *sight* warded will not be revealed unless you are inside that brush. This only applies to his/her own vision.
• The next *Transference* within 3 seconds will target two nearest enemy targets instead.
